com.grzm.pqconninfo.alpha

Class BaseContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.grzm.pqconninfo.alpha.BaseContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UnixContext, WindowsContext

    public abstract class BaseContext
extends Object
implements Context
    Implementations of Context methods common to all implementations.

      InputStream getConfigSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream()

      Returns the input stream of the contents of the service file in the sysconfdir specified by pg_config.
      InputStream getEnvPassfileInputStream(String envPassfile)
      Returns the input stream of the contents of the passfile specified by the PGPASSFILE environment variable.
      InputStream getEnvServiceFileInputStream()
      Returns an input stream of the contents of the service file specified by the PGSERVICEFILE environment variable.
      InputStream getEnvSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream()
      Returns the input stream of the contents of the service file in the directory specified by the PGSYSCONFDIR environment variable.
      String getEnvSysconfdirServiceFilename()
      Returns the name of the service file in the sysconfir specified by the PGSYSCONFDIR environment variable.
      InputStream getSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream()
      Returns an input stream of the contents of the service file in the sysconfdir.
      String getSystemUser()
      Returns the system user (corresponding to the "user.home" System property value on the JVM).
      abstract InputStream getUserServiceFileInputStream()
      Returns an input stream of the contents of the per-user service file.
      String getUserServiceFilename()
      Returns the name of the per-user service file.

    • Method Detail

      • getEnvServiceFileInputStream

        public InputStream getEnvServiceFileInputStream()
        Returns an input stream of the contents of the service file specified by the PGSERVICEFILE environment variable. Returns null if the environment variable isn't set, or the file doesn't exit, or if there's an error creating the input stream.
        Specified by:
        getEnvServiceFileInputStream in interface Context
        Returns:
        The input stream of the service file contents, or null

      • getUserServiceFileInputStream

        public abstract InputStream getUserServiceFileInputStream()
        Returns an input stream of the contents of the per-user service file. Returns null if the file doesn't exist or if there's an error creating the input stream.
        Specified by:
        getUserServiceFileInputStream in interface Context
        Returns:
        The input stream of the service file contents, or null

      • getEnvSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream

        public InputStream getEnvSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream()
        Returns the input stream of the contents of the service file in the directory specified by the PGSYSCONFDIR environment variable. If the environment variable is not set, or if the file doesn't exist or the input stream can't be created, it returns null.
        Specified by:
        getEnvSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream in interface Context
        Returns:
        the service file input stream

      • getConfigSysconfdirServiceFilename

        public String getConfigSysconfdirServiceFilename()
        Returns the input stream of the contents of the service file in the sysconfdir specified by pg_config. If the input stream can't be created for any reason (such as pg_config isn't found, or the file doesn't exist) null is returned.
        Specified by:
        getConfigSysconfdirServiceFilename in interface Context
        Returns:
        the service file input stream

      • getConfigSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream

        public InputStream getConfigSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream()
        Returns the input stream of the contents of the service file in the sysconfdir specified by pg_config. Returns null if there's an error calling pg_config, or the service file doesn't exist, or if there's an error creating the input stream.
        Specified by:
        getConfigSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream in interface Context
        Returns:
        the input stream of the service file contents, or null

      • getSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream

        public InputStream getSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream()
        Returns an input stream of the contents of the service file in the sysconfdir. Returns null if the file doesn't exist or if there's an error creating the input stream.
        Specified by:
        getSysconfdirServiceFileInputStream in interface Context
        Returns:
        The input stream of the service file contents, or null

      • getEnvPassfileInputStream

        public InputStream getEnvPassfileInputStream(String envPassfile)
        Returns the input stream of the contents of the passfile specified by the PGPASSFILE environment variable. Returns null if the environment variable isn't set or the file doesn't exist, or if there's an error creating the input stream.
        Specified by:
        getEnvPassfileInputStream in interface Context
        Parameters:
        envPassfile - The filename specified by the PGPASSFILE
        Returns:
        the input stream of the contents of the passfile, or null
